experiences.title: Magnolia Cakes and Cupcakes
experiences.description:
Position: Software Engineer Intern 
 Time: 08/2023-11/2023 
Description: 
‚Ä¢Worked in a team of 4 to develop an e-commerce website for a local business as the Capstone Project for the master's degree, which received a grade of 88/100 from the supervisor. 
‚Ä¢Developed the project with ReactJS as the frontend and Django as the backend.
‚Ä¢Utilize Google Cloud and GoDaddy to host the application. 
‚Ä¢Efficient use of Scrum project management and GitHub to manage the application.

experiences.title: RMIT University
experiences.description:
Position: Peer Mentor 
 Time: 01/2023-07/2023 
Description: 
‚Ä¢Providing guidance and support for students who need help with any programming problems.
‚Ä¢Assisting with subject content, general study advice, and time management strategies.
‚Ä¢Work collaboratively with other mentors to fully support the mentees to boost their study significantly.
‚Ä¢Demonstrating strong communication skills and ability to work in a team environment.

aboutpara: A Master level software engineer graduated with top academic results and a full right to work in Australia. Throughout my studies at RMIT, I have completed multiple projects demonstrating my skills and abilities in designing, developing, and testing software applications using various technologies and tools, such as ReactJS, Django, Google Cloud, Flutter, Firebase, Java, Python, C++, GitHub, and Agile. With a strong passion and excitement for software development, I strongly believe that I will make a huge contribution to projects in the industry.
